description: This is an adapter class for a RecyclerView in an Android app, used to display a list of notes with titles, snippets, dates, and indicator icons for pins and favorites. It manages view creation, data binding, diff calculations for list updates, and user interactions like clicks on notes and menu buttons.

classes.name: NotesListAdapter
classes.description: Adapter for displaying a list of notes in a RecyclerView, handling view binding, user interactions, and efficient list updates.

methods.name: submitList
methods.description: Replaces the current list of notes with a new list, calculating differences for smooth UI updates.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Creates and initializes a new ViewHolder for a note item view.

methods.name: getItemCount
methods.description: Returns the total number of notes in the list.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds note data to the ViewHolder and sets click listeners for user interactions.

methods.name: VH.bind
methods.description: Populates the individual note item view with data from a Note object, setting text and visibility of icons based on note properties.
